widget.label: Show user image on this website
widget.tooltip: Select this checkmark to allow the Avatar plugin to make use of images loaded on this Snap! Websites.
widget.help: This checkmark allows the Avatar plugin to retrieve images from this website only. Users who did not load an image get the default defined below.

widget.label: Share your users images with other websites on this Snap! Installation
widget.tooltip: Select this checkmark to allow the Avatar plugin to make use of images loaded by your users on any website this Snap! Installation has.
widget.help: When checked this option authorize the Avatar plugin to retrieve images from this website. Each user can also individually refuse to show their avatar on other websites.

widget.label: Show user Snap! image
widget.tooltip: Select this checkmark to allow the Avatar plugin to make use of images loaded on this Snap! Websites installation by the end users. This works across all the Snap! websites.
widget.help: This checkmark authorizes the Avatar plugin to retrieve images from any user who registered on any website on this Snap! Installation. Note that each website and each user has the right to prevent images from being shared.

widget.label: Show user Gravatar image
widget.tooltip: Select this checkmark to allow the Avatar plugin to check for an image on Gravatar.
widget.help: Many users have an account registered with Gravatar which is a major Avatar system on the Internet. This option allows the use of Gravatar from this website.
